channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- Workstation Pro / Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- Workstation Pro / Player

item.title: CVE-2017-4950|2024-09-17T02:47:03.609Z -- vmware -- workstation%20pro%20%2F%20player
item.description: VMware Workstation and Fusion contain an integer overflow vulnerability in VMware NAT service when IPv6 mode is enabled. This issue may lead to an out-of-bound read which can then be used to execute code on the host in conjunction with other issues. Note: IPv6 mode for VMNAT is not enabled by default.
